title: 2013 Taft Union High School Gunfire Incident Report

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

The incident report and any law enforcement reports and or incident reports, including supplements such as police narratives, produced in relation to the shooting incident at Taft Union High School on 1/10/2013 located at 701 Wildcat Way Taft, CA 93268-2319. For more information on the specific incident, there is a media report on it: https://www.theguardian.com/world/2013/jan/10/taft-california-high-school-shooting 

In the event that there are fees, I would request a waiver, as I am a member of a nonprofit media outlet and these records will be used in the public interest. The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes. 

I would prefer the request filed electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Sincerely, 
Daniella Jimenez
Investigative Reporting Workshop.
